summary.span: 命名空间为使用托管代码的编译器编写器提供在元数据中指定属性（这些属性影响公共语言运行时的运行时行为）的功能。

span.span: The namespace provides functionality for compiler writers who use managed code to specify attributes in metadata that affect the run-time behavior of the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间主要用于编译器编写器，不过，它的多个类（例如 ）在各种应用程序中使用。This namespace is primarily for compiler writers, although several of its classes, such as , are used in a wide variety of applications.
